'Primer' is the sixth studio album by the a cappella group Rockapella and marks
their North American debut. Its track list was intended to represent the band's
live show at the time and was recorded 99% live-in-studio over the course of two
days at Sonalysts Studios in Connecticut, with the exception of the bonus track,
"Shambala," which was recorded prior to the Sonalysts sessions.
